thread.title: BRIEF-Google Announcing VPC Service Controls To Add To its Protections‍​

title: BRIEF-Google Announcing VPC Service Controls To Add To its Protections‍​
text: March 21, 2018 / 2:06 PM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-Google Announcing VPC Service Controls To Add To its Protections‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 21 (Reuters) - Google : * ANNOUNCING VPC SERVICE CONTROLS, WHICH ALLOW USERS TO DEFINE SECURITY PERIMETER AROUND CLOUD PLATFORM RESOURCES, TO ADD TO CO’S SET OF PROTECTIONS‍​ * INTRODUCING ADDITIONS TO SECURITY CENTER, INCLUDING NEW CHARTS WHICH "HIGHLIGHT PHISHING THREATS AND SUSPICIOUS DEVICE ACTIVITY" Source text : ( bit.ly/2pv3zRB ) Further company coverage:
